solution_line_template: A sheet has {cookies_per_sheet} cookies, so if each church member baked {sheets_per_member} sheets, they each baked {sheets_per_member} sheets/person * {cookies_per_sheet} cookies/sheet = <<{sheets_per_member}*{cookies_per_sheet}={cookies_per_member}>>{cookies_per_member} cookies/person

The total number of church members who decided to volunteer is {num_members}, so in total, they baked {cookies_per_member} cookies/person * {num_members} people = <<{num_members}*{cookies_per_member}={total_cookies}>>{total_cookies} cookies
